members.name: LockedFile.fileHandle
members.description: The FileHandle object from which the lock was opened.

members.name: LockedFile.mode
members.description: The mode for accessing the file; can be readonly or readwrite.

members.name: LockedFile.active
members.description: A flag indicating if the file can be accessed (true) or not (false).

members.name: LockedFile.location
members.description: The position of the reading/writing pointer within the file.

members.name: LockedFile.oncomplete
members.description: The complete event is triggered each time a read or write operation is successful.

members.name: LockedFile.onabort
members.description: The abort event is triggered each time the abort() method is called.

members.name: LockedFile.onerror
members.description: The error event is triggered each time something goes wrong.

members.name: LockedFile.getMetadata()
members.description: Allows to retrieve the file metadata (size and date of the last modification). Returns a FileRequest.

parameters.name: param Optional
parameters.description: An object used to request specific metadata. Each key is a boolean where true means the metadata is expected and where false means it is not expected. Note that if the key is undefined, it is considered as if it were true. The following metadata are supported:

members.name: LockedFile.readAsArrayBuffer()
members.description: Allows to retrieve a part of the content of the file as an ArrayBuffer. Returns a FileRequest object.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: A number representing the number of bytes to read in the file.

members.name: LockedFile.readAsText()
members.description: Allows to retrieve a part of the content of the file as a string. Returns a FileRequest object.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: A number representing the number of bytes to read in the file.

parameters.name: encoding Optional
parameters.description: A string indicating the encoding to use for the returned data. By default, UTF-8 is assumed if this parameter is not specified.

members.name: LockedFile.write()
members.description: Allows to write some data in the file starting at the location offset. Returns a FileRequest object.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to write into the file. It can be a string or an ArrayBuffer.

members.name: LockedFile.append()
members.description: Allows to write some data at the end of the file. Returns a FileRequest object.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to write into the file. It can be a string or an ArrayBuffer.

members.name: LockedFile.truncate()
members.description: Allows to truncate the file's content. Returns a FileRequest object.

parameters.name: start Optional
parameters.description: A number representing the index where to start the operation.

members.name: LockedFile.flush()
members.description: Allows to guarantee that any buffered data has been transferred to disk.

members.name: LockedFile.abort()
members.description: Makes the LockedFile inactive and cancels all ongoing operations.
